item.description: When an investigative reporter learns of a scientist's discovery involving the demise of Earth, he attempts to rescue his family from catastrophic natural disasters around the world, as the government builds arks to save some of the population.

In a post-apocalyptic world devoid of any human existence and full of marauding machines, a lone burlap doll is brought to life and exposed to small community of other dolls, and he attempts to lead them in a revolution against the deadly machines.

item.title: A Beautiful Mind
item.description: After making an important mathematical discovery, a man is awarded a teaching position at the prestigious Massachusetts Institute of Technology and meets his future wife; soon he is approached by the CIA and begins to suffer from painful delusions.

item.title: A Scanner Darkly
item.description: An undercover detective's double life as a drug dealer becomes increasingly dangerous as his addiction to a radical new hallucinogen begins to alter his memory and affect his ability to tell his two personas apart.

item.title: A Serious Man
item.description: Leading up to his son's bar mitzvah, a passive, Jewish college professor finds his life slowly falling apart when his wife suddenly wants to leave him for an eccentric widower and a student attempts to blackmail him for a passing grade.

item.title: A Single Man
item.description: A homosexual college professor in 1962 California, bereaved after the death of his longtime lover, contemplates suicide, but unexpected encounters with a female friend and a very smitten student give him pause to reconsider.

item.title: A Time to Kill
item.description: A grieving black father confronts and guns down the two white men who raped and murdered his 10-year-old daughter; a young lawyer is set to defend the man for murder and soon finds himself and his family in the crosshairs of the local Ku Klux Klan.

item.title: A Very Long Engagement
item.description: During World War I, a young soldier disappears under mysterious circumstances, which causes his saddened fiancé to embark on a rigorous journey to find the truth and reveal the answers behind her lover's untimely demise.

item.title: Absolon
item.description: In the future a virus has killed billions of people and only the drug Absolon can keep the survivors alive but an evil conspiracy seeks to hide a better cure.

item.title: Adventureland
item.description: In 1987, a college student plans to tour Europe during the summer before returning to school, but when he is forced to get a job at a decrepit amusement park instead, he discovers new meaning in life from a group of colorful co-workers.

item.title: Air Force One
item.description: The President of the United States is forced to take matters into his own hands when Kazakhstani hijackers, aided by a treacherous Secret Service agent, take control of his plane, hold his family hostage and demand the release of a terrorist leader.

item.title: Airborne
item.description: A California teen is sent to live with his reserved relatives in Cincinnati and is therefore forced to trade in his surf board for rollerblades.

item.title: Anger Management
item.description: A mild-mannered man has an out-of-character incident while on board an airplane, and a judge sentences him to therapy with an eccentric anger management therapist whose unorthodox means make everyone around him uncomfortable.

item.title: August Evening
item.description: Jaime, un anciano indocumentado, reconoce la fuerza inevitable del tiempo y decide decirle adiós a su nuera Lupe para que ella rehaga su vida de nuevo, pero ella se siente dividida entre seguir tras su felicidad o seguir cuidando a su suegro enfermo.

item.title: B.T.K.
item.description: A real-life killer named Dennis Rader tortured and murdered 10 victims in the years between 1974 and 1991, posing as a model husband and father and an active member of a Lutheran church in Wichita, Kansas while evading arrest until 2005.

item.title: Backdraft
item.description: Two brothers with a history of conflict decide to become firefighters together, but when a series of fires are set by an arsonist around the city, they are forced to unite and find the person responsible for killing their fellow firemen.

item.title: Bait
item.description: After his dying cellmate gives him a mysterious clue about the location of a $42 million depository of stolen gold, a petty New York thief is unwittingly used by the FBI to draw out the computer genius mastermind behind the major heist.

item.title: Barbershop
item.description: A man sells his late father's barbershop to a loan shark to pay his mounting personal debts, not realizing the place has become a local institution and his decision will demoralize the neighborhood.

item.title: Batman
item.description: The Joker, the Riddler, the Penguin and Catwoman join forces in a world domination scheme that pits them against Batman and Robin.

item.title: Beerfest
item.description: Two German-American brothers travel to Germany to prove to their German-born family that Americans can chug beer with the best of them after discovering an undercover beer competition; the boys build a team and train hard to bring home the gold.

item.title: Before Sunset
item.description: An American writer on a book tour in Paris reunites with the environmentalist Frenchwoman he met and fell in love with nine years ago. They stroll through the streets reminiscing and reconnecting until the writer's plane is scheduled to depart.

item.title: Behind Enemy Lines
item.description: A U.S. Navy pilot is sent to do photographic reconnaissance over a remote area during the hostilities in Bosnia and he gets proof that war crimes on a massive scale are being committed before his plane is shot down and he is pursued by enemies.

item.title: Black Beauty
item.description: A Victorian-era horse relates its numerous exciting adventures and unforgettable experiences as it lives its life being passed from one owner to the next, each new owner opening a new chapter in the horse's life and creating more adventures.

item.title: Blade Runner
item.description: In 2019 Los Angeles, a cop who tracks renegade androids is called back for one last case after a group of the robots returns to the city, searching for the secret of prolonging their artificial existence by confronting their creators.

item.title: Blue Crush
item.description: Nothing had ever come between Anne Marie and her passion for surfing until Matt entered her life, but sometimes questioning what you love is how you find it.

item.title: Bottle Shock
item.description: The British owner of a failing wine shop specializing in French vintages sets up a blind taste test competition between French and American wines during a time when Napa Valley was virtually unknown and American wineries were largely disregarded.

item.title: Broadcast News
item.description: A successful TV news producer finds herself falling for the attractive new anchorman at her network even though her ace reporter loves her too.

item.title: Cactus Flower
item.description: A philandering dentist tries to end his affair with an uninhibited woman by claiming he is married to his stuffy office assistant.

item.title: Cairo Time
item.description: A magazine editor arrives in Cairo to meet her husband, but he is delayed by work in Gaza and sends a long-time Egyptian friend of his to show her around, unaware that the two will have an instant and powerful attraction to each other.

item.title: Cantaclaro
item.description: Un hombre duda entre decirle a su hija que él no es su padre biológico o seguir callando su secreto.

item.title: Captain Apache
item.description: A Native American-born U.S. Army officer known as Captain Apache is assigned to investigate the death of an Indian Commissioner, and soon he uncovers a crafty scheme involving a wealthy landowner and a plot to victimize the local tribes.

item.title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
item.description: An Italian commander falls in love with a fisherman's fiancée during the Axis occupation of a Greek island during World War II, but when Italy surrenders and joins the Allies, he must defend the island against a German invasion.

item.title: Cirque Du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
item.description: While a young man is visiting a unique circus, he encounters a mysteriously fascinating man, and after sharing a series of dramatic incidents with him, the youth is forced to make a drastic decision that will alter his life forever.

item.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
item.description: A young inventor creates a way to convert water into food, causing it to rain munchies on the neighbors of his island home, but when the device gets out of control, it creates a perfect storm of tasty treats that threatens to destroy the world.

item.title: Coal Miner's Daughter
item.description: Married at 13 and the mother of a large family by 20, Loretta Lynn never saw her own life as meant for anything other than homemaking until her husband inspired her by presenting her with a guitar for their anniversary and encouraged her to sing.

item.title: Collision Course
item.description: An insensitive Detroit cop and an uptight Japanese detective are forced to work together in order to discover the whereabouts of a notorious Japanese gangster, and the unlikely team turns the Motor City upside down in their determined search.

item.title: Conan the Destroyer
item.description: Conan the legendary warrior and his group of unlikely allies travel to a mighty fortress to rescue a young princess and her bodyguard from imprisonment, but the evil queen who sent them on their quest has a wicked agenda of her own.

item.title: Cop Out
item.description: After a skilled thief has stolen a very rare baseball card he needs to finance his daughter's upcoming wedding from a New York City police officer, the angry cop enlists his clueless partner in searching for the perpetrator.

item.title: Cop and a Half
item.description: A third-grader who loves TV cop shows witnesses a real-life murder and won't share his information with the police unless they make him a cop, so he is teamed with a hard-boiled detective who hates kids as the killers try to find and silence him.

item.title: Cotton Comes to Harlem
item.description: Two black cops in Harlem suspect a preacher of taking from the poor when he sells trips back to Africa on an installment plan.

item.title: Couples Retreat
item.description: A troubled husband and wife invite three other couples to join them at an island retreat without telling them about its couples' therapy sessions, and the others think it's a joke until they learn the sessions are mandatory and quite uncomfortable.

item.title: Couples Retreat
item.description: Un pareja atormentada invita a tres parejas a un resort en una isla, sin decirles sobre su sesiones de terapia de parejas, y los otros creen que es una broma hasta descubrir que las sesiones son obligatorias y muy incómodas.

item.title: Dancer, Texas Pop. 81
item.description: Four friends from the small Texas township of Dancer are graduating from high school and are planning to move to L.A. following graduation, taking the population of Dancer down to 77 from 81; all other 77 locals feel threatened by their decision.

item.title: Daredevil
item.description: A boy who is accidentally blinded after a toxic spill learns to use his other senses in an extraordinary way, leading him to become a superhero at night while practicing law during the day; he falls in love with a fellow superhero.

item.title: Dead Poets Society
item.description: Through poetry and the liberating thoughts of innovative writers, a passionate and unconventional English teacher shows an eclectic group of preparatory school boys a whole new perspective on life, learning and education.

item.title: Defending Your Life
item.description: The spirit of a recently-deceased business executive attempts to gain access to the afterlife by proving that he lived his life to the fullest, enjoyed every minute of it, and was able to learn from his mistakes, but his case appears to be uncertain.

item.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
item.description: Just before their 18th anniversary, the wife of a successful lawyer comes home to find her belongings in a rental truck and her husband's mistress moving in, but her gun-toting grandmother helps her regain her confidence and get back on her feet.

item.title: Down Periscope
item.description: An unconventional Navy officer and his crew of misfits and goldbricks are assigned to take a rusty and outmoded submarine into mock battle against the newest sub in the fleet and it's the last chance the new commander will have to prove their worth.

item.title: Eagle Eye
item.description: When their lives and loved ones are threatened, two strangers are forced to follow the orders of a mysterious, unidentified woman, who uses technology to track their every move and convince authorities they are the nation's most wanted fugitives.

item.title: Ed Gein: The Butcher of Plainfield
item.description: A quiet, seemingly innocent young man goes on a rampage in Plainfield, Wisconsin, during the late 1950s, committing many bizarre and morbid crimes.

item.title: El seminarista de los ojos negros
item.description: Deodato siempre soñó con ser cura y para ello ingresó en el seminario, pero cuando más seguro estaba de su fe se enfrenta a la prueba más dura de su existencia, cuando aparece en su vida la chica de quien siempre estuvo enamorado.

item.title: Fanny
item.description: A young man follows his love for the ocean and leaves his pregnant girlfriend to sail on the sea, but when he returns from his nine year voyage to be reunited with his true love and their young son, he finds that things are not as he left them.

item.title: Finding Amanda
item.description: A television producer undergoing therapy for his alcohol and gambling habits is chosen by the family to go to Las Vegas and save his young niece, who is rumored to be nursing her own addictions and working as a prostitute.

item.title: Fireproof
item.description: A courageous fireman is about to give up on his failing marriage, when his father challenges him with a 40-day experiment to rekindle the romance with his wife, but when she rejects his efforts, his commitment to their marriage is put to the test.

item.title: Four Christmases
item.description: Trying to avoid their parents during Christmas, a couple plans a secret trip and tells everyone they are helping a charity, but when the trip is interrupted, they must visit each of their divorced parents, which leads to trouble and revelations.

item.title: Friday the 13th
item.description: A man searches for his missing sister at an abandoned summer camp in the woods, as a group of party-going college students arrive for a weekend getaway, but soon a sadistic madman begins a murderous rampage upon the unsuspecting visitors.

item.title: Georgia Rule
item.description: When a rebellious California teenager spirals out of control, her mother takes her to live with her no-nonsense grandmother in small-town Idaho, where she shakes up the town with her unorthodox behavior and ends up revealing a dark family secret.

item.title: Get Carter
item.description: A sullen and ruthless mob enforcer learns that his brother was the victim of murder and forms an uneasy alliance with his widowed sister-in-law to find out who is responsible for his brother's death and deliver his own brand of justice.

item.title: GoodFellas
item.description: A young man grows up under the guidance of the New York Mafia, advancing from petty crimes to murders while gaining wealth and power as he is drawn into a corrupt world of increasing violence in which he must learn to fight for his life.

item.title: Gran Torino
item.description: After an aging, disgruntled veteran of the Korean War catches his Asian neighbor's son trying to steal the 1972 Gran Torino he dearly prizes, he is forced to face his racial prejudices while becoming involved in the troubled teenager's life.

item.title: Green Zone
item.description: A Special Forces soldier in Iraq is assigned to search for weapons of mass destruction; when repeated raids turn up none, he investigates and discovers a conspiracy that reaches to the highest levels of the military-industrial complex.

item.title: Guerra de dragones
item.description: Según una leyenda coreana, criaturas desconocidas asolarán el planeta y un periodista decide investigar cuando una serie de criaturas llegan por la ciudad de Los Ángeles creando el caos, y él y su misteriosa amiga podrían salvar la Tierra.

item.title: Hair
item.description: A quiet and somewhat repressed young man from the Midwest falls in love and joins a group of free-spirited hippies who reside in New York's Central Park, but his happiness is cut short when he is drafted to fight in Vietnam.

item.title: He's Just Not That Into You
item.description: A needy woman who is looking for the perfect man receives advice from her friends about the dating scene, while her friends must deal with their own struggles with men regarding commitment issues, potential affairs and online encounters.

item.title: He's Just Not That Into You
item.description: Una mujer necesitada, que anda buscando al hombre perfecto recibe consejo de sus amigos sobre el tema, quienes también se enfrentan a problemas relacionados con el compromiso, posibles idilios y encuentros on-line.

item.title: Head of State
item.description: Following his heroic rescue of an old woman and her cat, a Washington, D.C. alderman is selected to replace the late Democratic candidate for President, and he manages to surprise everyone by voicing the hopes of voters with his unorthodox campaign.

item.title: Hollywood Homicide
item.description: A veteran detective and his rookie partner juggle side careers as a real estate agent and an aspiring actor as they try to infiltrate the world of hip-hop after an up-and-coming rap group is murdered during a performance.

item.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
item.description: As Manny and Ellie prepare for the arrival of their unborn baby, Scrat finds romance and parenthood while attempting to raise three baby dinosaurs he found, when the real parents arrive, Scrat's friends must save him from enormous trouble.

item.title: In Memory of My Father
item.description: In the wake of their celebrity father's recent passing, three brothers are forced to confront their own issues with one another and the rest of the family, but their problems wind up overshadowing the burial of their father.

item.title: Indecent Proposal
item.description: A real-estate broker and his architect wife seek funding for their dream house, and a millionaire offers to solve the young couple's financial problems by paying $1,000,000 for one night with the wife.

item.title: John Carpenter's Escape from L.A.
item.description: Snake Plissken has the task of finding the President's daughter and a doomsday device in the penal colony formerly known as Los Angeles.

item.title: Johnny Dangerously
item.description: While pretending to be a law-abiding nightclub owner, a man takes on a job with mobsters to help pay for his mother's operation and his younger brother's law school tuition and grows to be the leader of a vast criminal underworld.

item.title: Just Cause
item.description: About to be put to death for a heinous kidnapping, rape and murder of an 11-year-old girl that he didn't commit, a black man enlists the services of a Harvard law professor to take on the local establishment and prove his innocence.

item.title: Just Friends
item.description: In New Jersey, an overweight high school misfit has a crush on a girl who likes him as a friend; 10 years later, he returns as a handsome, successful record producer and tries again to win her heart, but another geek who made good stands in the way.

item.title: Kingdom of the Spiders
item.description: When a horde of massive, rampaging tarantulas overrun a small, rural community, a veterinarian and an entomologist team up in an attempt to solve the problem, but they and other townspeople are forced to seek refuge inside of a secluded desert hotel.

item.title: La supremacía Bourne
item.description: Un ex-asesino de la CIA, que vive en el anonimato, siempre huyendo y lucha por recuperar recuerdos de su pasado, se ve nuevamente inmerso en su vida pasada después de haber sido culpado por un rival del asesinado de un agente del gobierno.

item.title: Legion
item.description: The customers and employees at a small diner in a remote part of the New Mexico desert witness a horrifying battle between competing factions of angels after God sends them to Earth to bring about the Apocalypse and destroy mankind.

item.title: Living Hell
item.description: A schoolteacher finds out that his mother was involved with a Cold War military project that released an organism capable of destroying human life, and he must find a way to stop it before the government takes drastic action.

item.title: Los hermanos Muerte
item.description: Una mujer decide vengar la muerte de su padre, que murió víctima de la revolución en México.

item.title: Los hijos de don Venancio
item.description: Todos sus hijos, excepto uno, olvidaron felicitar a su padre en el día de su cumpleaños, pero éste los perdona y los recibe con los brazos abiertos.

item.title: Love Takes Wing
item.description: When a young widow becomes the new doctor in a small frontier town, she must learn to gain the trust of the townspeople as she struggles to discover the cause of a mysterious illness taking the lives of children in a local orphanage.

item.title: Love's Unfolding Dream
item.description: A woman and her son move to her father's ranch after the sudden death of her husband when she realizes she will be unable to care for the land on her own; a young orphan moves in with the small family and everyone learns how to move on from the past.

item.title: Lower Learning
item.description: The struggling vice principal of an extremely disreputable elementary school attempts to save his place of employment from closure when the school board sends an inspector to assess the rapidly-deteriorating work environment.

item.title: Lucky Number Slevin
item.description: A man visiting the city teams up with a missing friend's next door neighbor to find him, but the mob and a crimelord's assassin confuse him for the man they're all looking for, leaving them both in jeopardy; his friend's debts come back to haunt him.

item.title: Maratón de baile
item.description: Don Pepe, un empresario teatral, bastante sinvergüenza, organiza un maratón de baile que durará 672 horas, durante el cual surgirán varias anécdotas.

item.title: Medicine for Melancholy
item.description: A man and woman wake up in the same bed together after a night of heavy drinking with no recollection of each other's names or how they met, but after spending part of the day together, they realize that their connection might be more superficial.

item.title: Michael Clayton
item.description: After coming to the rescue of a coworker who suffered a nervous breakdown, an attorney finds himself in a fierce battle with the corporate lawyer of a prestigious firm that is being sued for $3 billion for its negligent over use of pesticides.

item.title: Monster's Ball
item.description: After experiencing a personal tragedy, a racist single father who works as a prison guard becomes intimately involved with the African-American widow of a condemned inmate he had to execute, and the two face opposition from both of their families.

item.title: Muppets from Space
item.description: On Miss Piggy's talk show, Gonzo announces to the world that his extraterrestrial family has been contacting him and that he intends to reunite with them, but a government agent kidnaps him, forcing Kermit to lead a rescue mission.

item.title: Murder at 1600
item.description: A homicide detective with the Washington D.C. Police Department conducts an investigation when the nude body of a beautiful woman is found in a bathroom at the White House and he finds that political cover-ups and intrigue complicate his case.

item.title: My One and Only
item.description: A woman is fed up with her bandleader husband's philandering ways, so she takes her two teenage sons and embarks on a cross-country road trip in search of a new man who is worthy of her affection and capable of supporting her and her kids.

item.title: National Lampoon's Vegas Vacation
item.description: The Griswold family takes a vacation to Las Vegas for some fun in the neon, but things go awry when Clark loses big at the gaming tables, Rusty becomes a high roller, Audrey visits some strange clubs and Ellen falls for entertainer Wayne Newton.

item.title: Ninja Assassin
item.description: When an agent investigates a clan of Ninja assassins for their crimes, her superiors warn her to stay away from them, but she discovers a member of the clan has gone rogue and is seeking revenge against his former master and his henchmen.

item.title: Nothing in Common
item.description: An advertising man's carefully balanced and fun-filled life begins to topple into utter chaos when his parents' 36-year marriage ends with his mother's unannounced departure, leaving his prickly father in need of serious help and support.

item.title: Oh, God! Book II
item.description: In an effort to reach his people and make them aware of his existence, God appoints a young girl to create a worldwide advertising campaign.

item.title: One Fine Day
item.description: A harried single mother and an irresponsible single father take turns watching their children while the other tries to work, but a series of mishaps and misunderstandings make it necessary for them to pull together to get through the day.

item.title: One Hour Photo
item.description: A photo lab technician who has no relatives or social existence intrudes into a family's life through their snapshots.

item.title: Paradise Now
item.description: Two young Palestinian men who are set to carry out a suicide bombing in Tel Aviv become separated from each other and must face their destiny alone.

item.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
item.description: A teenager is surprised to discover that he is a true descendant of the Greek gods, and his friends and family become involved in an ongoing war between Zeus and Hades over the recent theft of Zeus' powerful lightning bolts.

item.title: Pirate Radio
item.description: During the 1960s, a youth becomes involved with a pirate radio station that broadcasts rock 'n' roll without a license to the U.K. from a cramped boat anchored in international waters, but conservatives want the station shut down.

item.title: Public Enemies
item.description: In 1930s Chicago, a special agent is commissioned by the director of the FBI to apprehend the elusive and notorious bank robber John Dillinger and his gang, but Dillinger remains one step ahead and escapes after being captured.

item.title: Resident Evil
item.description: A special team of agents infiltrates an intricate underground research complex controlled by an insane super computer and populated by undead flesh-eating zombies; one highly trained commando stands up to the evil corporation.

item.title: Revolver
item.description: After serving seven years in solitary, a smart young man is released from prison and begins to make big sums of money by gambling, in hopes of saving up enough cash to have the criminal who sent him to the slammer murdered.

item.title: Richie Rich
item.description: Comic book hero Richie Rich, the richest boy in the world, comes to life as he tries to thwart the evil plotting of his father's chief financial advisor, who wants to kill Richie's parents and become CEO of his successful company.

item.title: Rudy
item.description: A student from a blue-collar milieu, dreams of playing football for the University of Notre Dame, but his small stature, unimpressive grades and lack of money seem to doom his chances until a sympathetic priest comes up with a plan that may work.

item.title: Secrets of the Summer House
item.description: A young wife realizes that her husband and unborn child are in danger and sets out to uncover the secret behind an ancient curse on the family's summer house, a search that leads her deep into the family's history of slavery.

item.title: Seed of Chucky
item.description: Chucky and Tiffany cut a bloody swathe across Hollywood after they are resurrected by their mild-mannered and gender-confused offspring.

item.title: Set It Off
item.description: Raised in the dangerous projects of Los Angeles, four lifelong friends are brought back together after a tragic series of events, and in order to move forward in life, they decide to take on a life of crime as bank robbers.

item.title: Short Term 12
item.description: As the supervisor for a housing facility for abused and neglected youth attempts to help the aggressive children with overcoming their pasts, the dramatic events occurring within his own life lead to self-reflection and unexpected answers.

item.title: Sidewalks of New York
item.description: The lives of six New Yorkers intersect as each of them desperately looks for a relationship that suits their own purposes and needs.

item.title: Sorority Boys
item.description: When three rowdy guys get booted from their frat house, they dress up as women and join the "ugly girl" sorority, where they figure they'll blend right in; in their new location, the men realize how hurtful they have been to women over the years.

item.title: Spy Kids
item.description: Two powerful secret agents join forces to raise a family, trading in their adventurous lives for parenthood; as their spy colleagues around the world start to disappear, they are called back into action against an evil techno-wizard.

item.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
item.description: The Enterprise crew discovers disassembled parts of an android prototype of Data when they are summoned to negotiate peace with a new Romulan leader, but the crew finds out that he is also a clone, with plans to completely destroy Earth.

item.title: Summer with Selik
item.description: A teenage Norwegian girl befriends a newborn harbor seal after rescuing it from death on a tiny island of rock and bringing it home as her pet.

item.title: Superfly
item.description: A street-smart cocaine dealer begins to think of his future and decides to make a big score before leaving his dead-end profession, but first he has to avoid becoming entangled with corrupt cops and escape the clutches of dangerous mobsters.

item.title: Taken in Broad Daylight
item.description: A teenager is kidnapped from an apparently safe place in the middle of the day and endures several days of torment at the hands of her deranged captor, eventually striking upon a daring plan to negotiate her own release.

item.title: Terminator Salvation
item.description: In 2018, a man leads the human resistance against a race of murderous robots bent on ending humankind; when he encounters another man whose identity and role in the future is unclear, he must determine if he is an ally or an enemy.

item.title: The '70s
item.description: Friends meet at Kent State at the beginning of the 1970s and experience change in their personal lives as they witness major social and political upheavals.

item.title: The Accused
item.description: After a woman is gang-raped in a bar, a female district attorney prosecutes the case; when the rapists manage to get off with a light sentence, she decides to prosecute those who stood by and did nothing.

item.title: The Addams Family
item.description: A con artist tries to dupe the eccentric Addams family out of their fortune by having her accomplice pose as the long-lost Uncle Fester, and she manages to get the Addamses evicted from their house.

item.title: The Baker
item.description: A professional assassin comes to experience empowering second thoughts about his choice of profession when he attempts to hide from his criminal boss by seeking employment as a baker and romance in a quaint Welsh village.

item.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
item.description: A madam and the local sheriff try to stop a high-and-mighty evangelist from closing her down-home house of ill-repute.

item.title: The Betrayed
item.description: After her son is kidnapped, a woman has only hours to meet the demands of the boy's dangerous kidnappers, who believe that she is the only person who can figure out the clues that will lead them to millions of dollars stolen by her husband.

item.title: The Bounty Hunter
item.description: A reporter assigned to investigate a murder is relentlessly pursued by her ex-husband, the hapless bounty hunter, after she jumps bail to pursue her story, but when they become the prey they have to run for their lives while trying to solve the case.

item.title: The Bravados
item.description: A widower is tapped to capture the four escaped criminals who murdered his wife and bring them to justice.

item.title: The Cake Eaters
item.description: A prodigal son who left to pursue a career in music returns home after learning of his mother's death, only to find that his ex-fiancé has moved on with her life and the other members of his family are preoccupied with their own relationship issues.

item.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
item.description: During World War II, a smart and energetic Jewish teenager attempts to live a normal and happy life, while hiding from Adolf Hitler's Nazi regime in a secret location, which is housing two different families and a dentist.

item.title: The Education of Charlie Banks
item.description: A 16-year-old boy decides to go to the police after witnessing an acquaintance deliver a brutal beating to a couple of high school students, and he is forced to face the consequences of that decision when the attacker shows up three years later.

item.title: The End of Violence
item.description: A movie producer narrowly escapes the clutches of a hit man and seeks refuge with his Mexican gardener's family.

item.title: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
item.description: English map makers arrive in small Welsh community to measure the mountain that the locals take so much pride in and discover that it is only a high hill causing the villagers to take drastic steps to maintain they revered landmark.

item.title: The Firm
item.description: A Harvard Law School graduate is given a job offer that appears too good to be true, and once he accepts, he learns that the company perks were meant to buy his silence about their real business, one that could get him killed.

item.title: The Great Buck Howard
item.description: A young man decides to drop out of law school and become the personal assistant to an egotistical, flamboyant and demanding mentalist who is traveling across the country in order to raise his profile and revive his faded career in show business.

item.title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
item.description: When a woman accuses her gynecologist of molesting her, several other patients come forth to testify, and he commits suicide to avoid going to prison; after she has a baby, she hires a nanny and strange things begin to happen around the house.

item.title: The Hangover
item.description: After a bachelor party, groomsmen wake up in a Las Vegas hotel room with no memory of their wild night on the town, and they must piece together the clues and retrace their steps in order to find the missing groom before his wedding.

item.title: The Horse Soldiers
item.description: A Civil War colonel and major head a mission to cripple the supply lines of the Confederacy.

item.title: The Hunting Party
item.description: The wife of a rich and ruthless rancher is kidnapped by a famous outlaw so that she can teach him to read, but as they are chased by the rancher and his men, who want both of them dead, they fall in love with one another.

item.title: The Karate Kid III
item.description: Danny LaRusso wants to defend his title at the All-Valley Championship and naively goes against Mr. Miyagi's sage advice to become the student of Kresses's business partner who has vowed to help win back the championship for their failing dojo.

item.title: The Karate Kid, Part II
item.description: Martial arts teacher Mr. Miyagi and his loyal student Danny LaRusso travel to Okinawa, Japan to be at the bedside of Miyagi's dying father, but when the pair arrives they find that an old feud, new foes and romance are awaiting them.

item.title: The Karate Kid
item.description: A young teen moves from New Jersey to California, where he becomes the target of bullies from a martial-arts school; an elderly handyman rescues him and teaches him the art of karate using unorthodox methods designed to give him a fighter's mindset.

item.title: The Lawless Breed
item.description: After a notorious Texas outlaw wreaks havoc with his string of crimes and murders, he finally settles down to married life with a dance-hall girl, but he must confront his own past when his son begins adopting the same criminal ways.

item.title: The Maltese Falcon
item.description: An unsentimental detective takes on what seems to be a routine investigation but soon finds himself involved with an eccentric group of criminals, who are competing to acquire a mysterious and priceless falcon statuette.

item.title: The Medusa Touch
item.description: A French detective is investigating the series of mysterious circumstances that led to the near-death of a misanthropic author, and it soon discovered that the apparent victim is in possession of psychic powers that he has been using for a while.

item.title: The Open Road
item.description: When a minor league baseball player discovers his mother is in drastic need of heart surgery to save her life, he and his former girlfriend attempt to locate his estranged Hall of Fame father to reunite him with his mother.

item.title: The Patriot
item.description: A doctor living in a small town in the Rocky Mountain foothills tries to help stop a deadly viral outbreak caused by an experimental biological weapon as a group of ruthless and violent militia members in the area try to get the antidote.

item.title: The Poker Club
item.description: While playing their weekly poker game, four lifelong best friends inadvertently murder a mysterious intruder, who may have been with other criminals, and the decisions they make change their personal and family lives forever.

item.title: The Road
item.description: In a post-apocalyptic America, a man and his young son travel south to escape the unrelenting cold and must defend themselves against ruthless cannibals and battle the elements as they survive on scavenged food and each other's love.

item.title: The Sandlot
item.description: A shy klutz moves to a new neighborhood and is befriended by the ragtag baseball team that plays on the local sandlot, and he must enlist their aid when he accidentally loses his father's rare signed ball in a yard ruled by a savage dog.

item.title: The Sunset Limited
item.description: After a black ex-convict who hears a voice and believes that it is Jesus stops a white college professor from throwing himself under a train, they wind up in a powerful philosophical discussion about the existence of God and the afterlife.

item.title: The Sunset Limited
item.description: Después de que un ex-presidiario negro escucha una voz y cree que es Jesús evita que un profesor universitario blanco se lance bajo un tren, ellos terminan en una discusión filosófica sobre la existencia de Dios y la vida futura.

item.title: The Thing
item.description: After unearthing a long-buried spaceship at a remote Antarctic outpost, a scientific research team accidentally releases a 100,000-year-old alien organism that is highly destructive and has the ability to adopt the form of whomever it consumes.

item.title: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
item.description: A ranch hand sets out to fulfill a pledge to his best friend by burying him at his hometown in Mexico, and kidnaps the border guard who killed him as penance.

item.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
item.description: After a dramatic and dangerous altercation during Bella's 18th birthday party, Edward and the other vampires decide to leave town, and when Bella turns to her childhood friend, Jacob, for comfort, she is surprised to discover his frightening secret.

item.title: The Ugly Truth
item.description: When a romantically-challenged morning-show producer agrees to follow the instructions of her womanizing correspondent in hopes of attracting the man she likes, she soon discovers his advice may be working better than she had planned.

item.title: The Voyage
item.description: A beautiful Italian aristocrat accedes to her family's wishes by marrying a young man from a prominent family, and while she is a faithful and dedicated wife, she harbors love for his older brother, who struggles to keep his love for her a secret.

item.title: Tom and Jerry: The Magic Ring
item.description: A young sorcerer leaves a magic ring in the care of his cat, but the mouse in the house accidentally gets the ring stuck on his head leading to magical mayhem when he takes off for the big city with the desperate cat in hot pursuit.

item.title: Too Young to Be a Dad
item.description: A teenage couple experience a crisis of conscience when they have second thoughts about giving up their unborn child for adoption.

item.title: Tootsie
item.description: A demanding New York actor poses as a woman to land a job on a soap opera after alienating every producer by being extremely difficult to work with, but the situation becomes complicated when he falls in love with his co-star.

item.title: Traveller
item.description: A young man visits a group of gypsy-like drifters who take him into their clan where the learns the game, falls in love and yearns for a different life.

item.title: Trolls
item.description: A 9-year-old boy and his younger cousin will attempt to determine the complicated world of adults with their friends at the local playground, as they question what “doing it” really means along with other topics they do not want to ask their parents.

item.title: Tuck Everlasting
item.description: A teenager must choose whether to stay with an immortal man she has fallen in love with and live forever as the members of his family do or return to her family and their mortal life without fear of what death will bring.

item.title: Twilight
item.description: A young student encounters a vampire at her new school and soon falls in love with him, but when another vampire clan comes to visit, one of their strongest hunters decides to track her down and put an end to their controversial love affair.

item.title: Twins
item.description: An experiment to produce the perfect human being accidentally produces twins as one brother discovers he has a twin and goes to the city to reunite with him and start a search to find their parents but first he must save his brother from loan sharks.

item.title: Undead or Alive
item.description: An army deserter and a local cowboy who are running from the sheriff they robbed are joined by an Apache woman who wants to exact revenge on the white man; when they take her to an Army outpost as she requested, they find it overrun by zombies.

item.title: V.I. Warshawski
item.description: The daughter of a murdered ex-hockey player hires a private investigator who used to be interested in her father to investigate his death.

item.title: Valentine's Day
item.description: As Valentine's Day quickly approaches in the city of Los Angeles, couples will attempt to determine the status of their relationships, people will search for love and romance, and some will be the recipient of heartbreaking news.

item.title: War Eagle, Arkansas
item.description: A well-meaning youth who continually needs his wheelchair-bound companion by his side in order to have his stuttered sentences finished for him begins to spend time with a highly popular girl while attempting to decide upon the future he wants.

item.title: When in Rome
item.description: Despite her skewed disdain for romance, a lovely young woman will find herself pursued by suitors after visiting an enchanted fountain in Rome, and a determined reporter tries to distinguish himself from the rest of the crowd.

item.title: White Chicks
item.description: After two FBI agents botch a drug bust, they are assigned to guard two hotel heiresses, but when the girls refuse to leave their apartment for the Hamptons the agents must take their places in order to draw out their would-be abductors.

item.title: Why Did I Get Married?
item.description: While one of the four couples at an annual college reunion in Colorado struggles with infidelity, each of the other couples has some serious conversations about the states of their own marriages, discussing commitment, betrayal and forgiveness.

item.title: World's Greatest Dad
item.description: A subpar teacher, writer and father unexpectedly gets a second chance for popularity with his peers after he manipulates the events surrounding a personal tragedy and unexpectedly creates a viral sensation.

item.title: Ya No los Hacen Como Antes
item.description: El destino es responsable de que Benito y Genoveva, dos personas ya maduras y que han disfrutado de la vida, se encuentran y deciden darse una segunda oportunidad para conocerse mejor.

item.title: You Kill Me
item.description: An alcoholic hit man is sent to San Francisco to sober up after his drinking starts to interfere with his assassination duties; while trying to overcome his problem, the man meets new friends, including a beautiful mortuary worker.
